term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - discontinuous simultaneous techniques in analysis
term.title: discontinuous simultaneous techniques

item.text: The application of coupled techniques to the same sample when sampling for the second technique is discontinuous, e.g. discontinuous thermal analysis and gas chromatography, when discrete portions of evolved volatile(s) are collected from the sample situation in the instrument used for the first technique.
